parameters: There's an inscription on the vat that reads
"The Undesirables."
There is a large hole in the glass,\. like something that
was once in the vat forcefully broke out of it...
There's a big book open on the table.\.
It looks like a VERY long read.\.
Would you like to read it?
Beginning
Action
Experiments
No
Beginning
After everything that has happened to me, I felt inclined
to write about all my harrowing experiences. I think I
would feel better if I put all my thoughts to paper.
To preface, I don't recall my childhood with much fondness.
I was small. Weak. Bullies often made fun of me. Picked on
me. Called me names. The name I remember most was
"Eddie Spaghetti-Arms." That's not even clever.
I don't blame any of them though. Grandma always told me
that the reason bullies pick on others is that they are
unhappy with their own lives and want others to share in
their misery so they feel better about themselves.
I felt bad for them. I wanted to help them. Not just the
bullies, but anyone who just wanted to feel happy again
if their lives were consumed by misery. Wouldn't the
world just be so wonderful if everyone were so happy?
After my schoolings, I became a scientist and delved into
my research of the human mind and human emotions. I wanted
to find a way to remove undesirable emotions from the mind.
Hate and sadness have no place in a perfect world.
After years of study, I nearly gave up. The human mind,
even after all of these years, remains so much a mystery
to doctors and scientists alike. I was in the library one
night, thinking of throwing my dream away.
At that moment, someone walked past me just as a large book
fell out of their hands and hit the floor with a heavy thud.
The sound startled me. I reached down to pick up the book
and give it back to the person who dropped it.
But there was nobody there. It's as if they had vanished
completely. I looked at the book they had dropped.
"The Benefic Book". I decided to give the book a
quick glance-through.
To my delight, the book was perfect for my research. I was
looking in the wrong place all along! Science did not hold
the answers to my questions. But magic! Magic could explain
the unexplainable!
The Benefic Book detailed a magical enchantment that would
give me power over emotion! But the spell came with a price.
The book stated that going through this process would cost
me my "humanity." Whatever that meant.
Ultimately, my curiosity outweighed any fear of what the
consequences might entail, so I went back home to begin
preparations. To assist me in my work, I constructed two
robotic hands that I was able to control with my thoughts.
I followed the instructions of the enchantment perfectly.
Upon finishing the spell, my body was wracked in the most
horrible pain imaginable. My skin muscles and bones burned
away, leaving me as just a pile of my organs on the floor.
Though I was still in so much pain, I felt like a great
power had awakened within me. My brain and eyes were still
intact. I could still see and I could still think. Meaning
I could still control my robotic hands.
I set to work building a container that could hold and keep
my new form alive. I decided on a spherical design, and was
even able to implement a way for the container to portray
emotive facial expressions.
I then engineered a system of locomotion that my container
could rest on: a levitating platform. I fashioned a cloak
that could drape over the platform to make it somewhat more
presentable. My new form was complete.
I was a magically scientific monster. I hated it, yet loved
it at the same time. I couldn't say I was a human anymore.
I was part organism part machine. With new magical powers
that I could use to shape people's minds to my will!
The man known as Edward Bonhami was no more! Now I am
Amitous! The Benefactor of all people everywhere! With
my new powers, I will make the whole world happy! Then
everything and everyone will finally be perfect!
Action
I planned to begin working on fulfilling my dream in
earnest!\. I needed a base of operations to begin the
process of cleansing people, so I decided to overthrow
the king of Halcyon and take over the castle.
I knew that with my new powers that there was little the
king and his army could do to me. Besides, they wouldn't
care about my seige either way once they were cleansed.
I set off to the castle at once to test my powers.
On the way to the castle, I met a small green frog in black
shoes. He seemed very forlorn. I was just about to help him
and take his sadness and hate away, but I hesitated. I was
curious about this little frog's plight.
The frog was taken back by my appearance when I approached
him, but when I explained who I was and what my mission was,
the frog showed a great interest in wanting to help me
achieve my goals. He wanted to be "my sidekick."
Enriqué and I joined forces. Together, we took over Halcyon.
The Halcyonic Army was no match for my powers. I quickly
dispatched them all and took the castle and its army as my
own. I later engineered special masks to control them with.
Enriqué was in charge of getting the word out about my rule.
Anyone who harbored miserable lives did not have to live
with the misery anymore. All they had to do was come see
me! Amitous! And I would bless them with eternal happiness.
A miserable monster known as Hygluk came to see me soon
after I seized the castle. He offered to work for me if
I could give him a job. I accepted his offer, as long as
he was willing to uphold the good name of The Benefactor.
My takeover attracted the attention of other monsters as
well. Squidusa, the "Queen of the Ocean", had recently
arrived on the scene, garnering much attention from
many news stations.
She visited me and told me how desperately she wanted to
join forces. She seemed infatuated with me, whether because
of my form's good looks or my impressive power, I may never
know, but I accepted her into the team regardless.
And then there was Garskamar. He just appeared in the castle
one day with a giddy smile on his face. He decided to join
me in my efforts without asking me and without me agreeing
to him. To make matters worse, my powers don't work on him.
I know he's a villain, and I keep stressing to him that I
myself am not a villain, yet he just won't listen. He keeps
giving me "villain tips" on what he would do if he were in
my situation. What a nuisance. He won't persuade me.
As much as I don't like it, Garskamar is here to stay.
But even though I dislike him, I must say that some of his
ideas aren't that bad. Perhaps I'll make a few notes.
Now Enriqué, Hygluk, Squidusa, and Garskamar had joined me
in my mission. I decided to give their team a proper name.
The Benefic Four! Together we set to work preparing the
people of the world to be cleansed!
I began to use my army to search for people in Halcyon who
had yet to be cleansed. Many people were hiding for some
reason. I'm not sure why. Who wouldn't want to be happy
forever?
I ordered my Benefic Four to begin locking down other towns.
Once I was done cleansing Halcyon, I would travel to these
other towns and begin cleansing there. Enriqué wanted to
start with his own hometown for whatever reason.
My plans were going swimmingly. But then soon after Enriqué
locked down Frog Town, he told me some startling news. The
Legendary Hero had awoken and was presumably making their
way to confront me.
The Benefic Book had warned me that I may receive some
unwanted attention. But why would the Legendary Hero
want me? I'm trying to help the world, not destroy it!
I decided to put all other projects on hold while the
Hero was at large. Apparently, the Hero is looking for
pieces of a Legendary sword. Some were found in Halcyon.
Squidusa found one in the Ocean. Garskamar found another.
I entrusted a piece to each of my Benefic Four. The Hero
would be hard-pressed to get them all back. And even if
they did, I'm not worried. No sword can stand against me.
I am Amitous! The Benefactor! I am all-powerful!
Just try and stop me, Legendary Hero. Nothing will prevent
me from accomplishing my goals. Nothing! The world will be
perfect, and all people in the world will be perfect! And if
you resist, I will have no choice but to destroy you!
Experiments
I've found that extracting hate and sadness from a subject's
mind results in an unexpected byproduct: raw emotion.
Specifically raw hate and raw sadness.
The substance is a thick, wispy, shadowy, translucent
substance that seems to float around in the air almost
as if it's alive and searching for something.
I discovered that the raw emotion is pulled toward the brain
of the subject it was taken from, as if it wants to return
to its owner. Of course, I cannot let this happen if I want
my world to be perfect.
I've built a container to store all the raw emotion I
collect from the minds of my subjects. It's air tight
and made with thick glass so nothing can escape.
I've called the substances "The Undesirables." I must
research this unordinary substance. I will monitor its
behavior each day and report my findings.
DAY 1: I've added the undesirables from the entire Halcyon
army to the container. The substance seems to fill it
entirely. The substance is mildly swirling around like
grey storm clouds.
DAY 2: I've added the undesirables from a few more residents
of Halcyon to the container. There is little change from
yesterday, except the substances swirling around in the
container are a bit of a darker grey than usual.
DAY 3: More undesirables. The substances seems to be
unsettlingly restless. The substance is swirling around
the container at a fever pace, and I can hear the faintest
of noises from it as well. Like light taps on the glass.
DAY 4: Even more undesirables. The substances have almost
become violent now. They are a very dark grey. They are
swirling around chaotically and seem to almost be trying
to break out of the container.
DAY 5: There was a sudden change to the undesirables.
The dark gray substance is no longer trying to break
free from the container. I came to the room today to
find that they have been replaced by some black mass.
The mass is on the floor of the container, pulsing and
throbbing, almost like a beating heart. It appears sticky
and goopy with strange wispy tendrils emerging from it.
No light is reflected off its surface.
I must conclude that these are the same undesirables as
yesterday, but what had happened to them? I hesitated to
add the undesirables I had collected that day, but my
curiosity got the better of me.
As soon as I added them, the black mass seemed to absorb
the new undesirables into itself. The black mass became
slightly larger, and the rate at which it pulsed seemed
to quicken.
I'm slightly fearful of this strange behavior.
Perhaps I should have started with a bigger container?
I'll make some adjustments first thing tomorrow...
DAY 6: It's gone. The black mass is gone. I heard a loud
crash from my study in the middle of the night, along with
several loud banging sounds. I rushed to find the container
broken, the room a mess, and the undesirables missing.
This is not good. If the black mass was able to break from
the container, who knows what else it is capable of?
Have I just created a violent monster using the raw
emotions of the people I've cleansed?
DAY 7: I think I may be going insane. Everywhere I look,
I think I see the black mass. It's the same feeling when
you lose track of a giant spider on the wall. It could
be anywhere. The paranoia is starting to control me.
I'm afraid to cleanse any more people. Whenever I do, the
undesirables now scatter away before I can collect them.
I imagine they are now gravitating toward the creature
I've created, fueling its raw hate even more.
I'm now afraid to leave the castle in the fear of finding
the black mass. Or it finding me. But I can't put my main
objective to rest! I must put on a brave face for my team
and finish what I started.
DAY 8: NO! NO NO NO! I'm not doing a bad thing! I'm not
anything like what that creature says I am! That creature
is nothing to me! It can take its creepy white smile and
hit the road!
No. NO! It says it's going to kill me! Destroy me! No! NO!
YOU CAN'T KILL ME! I AM AMITOUS THE BENEFACTOR!!! I WAS
THE ONE WHO CREATED YOU! YOU HAVE NO PLACE IN THIS WORLD!
The laughter. THE LAUGHTER!!! THAT UNHOLY LAUGHTER OF A
THOUSAND VOICES. LAUGHING AT ME!!! ALL OF THEM! LAUGHING
AT ME! I CAN'T TAKE IT ANYMORE!!! I AM AMITOUS! THE
BENEFACTOR OF THE NEW WORLD! STOP IT! STOP IT!! STOP IT!!!
The rest is mindless nonsense...
No
